overview: Glory, money, beautiful women... Welcome to the world of professional football! But after the referee's final whistle, is everything so wonderful in this universe generating thousands of fantasies? In this so masculine world, the sexy Liza succeeded in becoming the most influential player's agent. To overtake one of her colleagues, she won't hesitate to use the most deviant methods. To obtain the exclusivity of Joel, a rising star, she will convince him by offering him the most delicious welcome gift. After giving in to the advances of two beautiful models who will fill him with the most enjoyable sexual practices, he will sign his contract eyes closed. But the hardest is yet to come...
title: Scandal In the Locker Room
